titles: A prymer in Englyshe with certeyn prayers [et] godly meditations, very necessary for all people that vnderstonde not the Latyne tongue. Cum priuilegio regali.
author: Catholic Church.
Marshall, William, fl. 1535. aut
Joye, George, d. 1553. Ortulus anime. aut
publisher: In Fletestrete by Johan Byddell. Dwellyng next to Flete Brydge at the signe of our Lady of pytye. for Wyllyam Marshall,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
The first primer in English; partially based on George Joye's "Ortulus anime" (STC 13828.4)--STC.
Imperfect; some leaves torn, some stained, affecting text throughout.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Prayer-books and devotions --  Early works to 1800.
Books of hours --  Early works to 1800.
